sentence: But he is facing a primary, as you said, against John Gibbs who is a former Trump administration official that Donald Trump has endorsed.
title: The Downballot: Why House Democrats' best defense is a good offense (transcript)

sentence: ? MI-03: Rep. Peter Meijer, who was one of the 10 House Republicans to vote to impeach Trump, faces primary opposition from conservative commentator John Gibbs, who is Trump's endorsed candidate.
